mapper.select: SELECT A.CHATROOM_IDX, C.MESSAGE_TEXT, C.CREATE_DATE FROM CHATROOM A JOIN USER B ON A.USER_IDX = B.USER_IDX1 AND A.USER_IDX = B.USER_IDX2 JOIN MESSAGE C ON B.CHATROOM_IDX = C.CHATROOM_IDX WHERE B.USER_IDX = #{userIdx} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY A.CHATROOM_IDX ORDER BY C.CREATED_DATE DESC
SELECT MESSAGE_IDX, SENDER_IDX, RECIPIENTS_IDX, MESSAGE_TEXT, CREATED_DATE FROM MESSAGE WHERE CHATROOM_IDX = #{chatroomIdx}
